record.id: syslanguage="en" and name="Delta Migration by Bg UNLs (Intro)"
record.recordid: en - Delta Migration by Bg UNLs (Intro)
record.name: Delta Migration by Bg UNLs (Intro)

field.output: 1. Specify a folder in the existing Service Manager system to export files.
field.property: Label;Caption=1. Specify a folder in the existing Service Manager system to export files. Name=label1388740355160 Height=2 Name=label1388740355160 Width=133 X=8 Y=0

field.output: 2. Start scheduler "dmt.unload.load", it will start five small schedulers
field.property: Label;Caption=2. Start scheduler "dmt.unload.load", it will start five small schedulers Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=2

field.output: 3. Input the folder name, and specify the range of the delta data in the next form.
field.property: Label;Caption=3. Input the folder name, and specify the range of the delta data in the next form. Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=4

field.output: 4. The tool creates some background schedule tasks to export the delta data into multiple UNL files,
field.property: Label;Caption=4. The tool creates some background schedule tasks to export the delta data into multiple UNL files, Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=6

field.output: these UNL files will be kept in the specified folder.
field.property: Label;Caption= these UNL files will be kept in the specified folder. Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=8

field.output: 5. Wait until all these background schedule tasks finished.
field.property: Label;Caption=5. Wait until all these background schedule tasks finished. Height=2 Name= Width=137 X=8 Y=10

field.output: 6. Copy the whole folder to the new Service Manager system.
field.property: Label;Caption=6. Copy the whole folder to the new Service Manager system. Caption=6. Copy the whole folder to the new Service Manager system. ?Caption= Height=2 Name= Width=137 X=8 Y=12

field.output: 7. Login the new Service Manager, click menu "Upgrade Utility > Delta Migration Import".
field.property: Label;Caption=7. Login the new Service Manager, click menu "Upgrade Utility > Delta Migration Import". Caption=7. Login the new Service Manager, click menu "Upgrade Utility > Delta Migration Import". ?Caption= Height=2 Name= Width=139 X=8 Y=14
